channel.title: Adding Documentation Files :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: When adding existing documentation files (i.e. UML documents) to your project, you may think adding them through Visual Studioâ€™s Solution Explorer would be the way to go. However, this can lead to an unexpected issue. Look closely at the example below: We can see the PDF has been added to the solution file in the Solution Explorer, and we can see its raw data open in the editing pane. But take a close look at the Properties.
